learningHub.title: Investment Learning Hub
learningHub.subtitle: Structured investment education from first steps to advanced strategies. Choose your level and learn at your own pace.
learningHub.trackProgressDescription: Sign up to save your reading progress and earn certificates.

basic.title: Basic Articles
basic.description: Start your investment journey with our beginner-friendly guides and tutorials. Perfect for new investors.
basic.yourProgressDescription: Mark articles as completed to track what you've already learned.
basic.ctaDescription: Once you have mastered the basics, explore our advanced articles for deeper insights and sophisticated strategies.

advanced.title: Advanced Articles
advanced.description: In-depth analysis and sophisticated strategies for experienced investors. Written by industry professionals.
advanced.prerequisitesDescription: These articles assume familiarity with basic investing concepts. Complete our Basic Articles first if you are new to investing.
advanced.yourProgressDescription: Mark articles you've mastered to track your expert-level learning.
advanced.ctaTitle: Take Your Skills to the Next Level
advanced.ctaDescription: Enroll in our structured learning course for a comprehensive investment education with certification.

articleDetail.notFoundDescription: The article you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
articleDetail.placeholderIntro: This is a placeholder for the full article content. In a production environment, this would contain the complete educational material with sections, examples, charts, and interactive elements.
articleDetail.whatYoullLearnDescriptionPrefix: This article provides in-depth coverage suitable for
articleDetail.continueLearningDescription: Explore more articles to build your investment knowledge.

courses.title: Financial Education Courses
courses.subtitle: Comprehensive courses covering everything from investment fundamentals to advanced trading strategies. Learn at your own pace with structured modules and practical lessons.
courses.seoDescription: Enroll in comprehensive finance and economics courses. Learn macroeconomics, microeconomics, finance & markets, and personal finance through structured courses with video lessons and quizzes.
courses.infoDescription: Each course is divided into modules with multiple lessons. Complete lessons at your own pace, take quizzes to test your knowledge, and pass the final exam to demonstrate mastery. Track your progress and return anytime to review materials.
courses.needToPass: You need {{rate}}% to pass. Try again!
courses.moduleTestReview: Review the material and try again
courses.masteryCheckReview: Review the material and try again. Pass rate: {{rate}}%

technical-analysis.description: Master chart patterns, indicators, and trading signals to time your market entries and exits

advanced-trading.description: Master options, derivatives, quantitative approaches, and algorithmic trading concepts

hero.title: Master the Markets
hero.subtitle: Investment Course
hero.description: A comprehensive, structured learning program designed to take you from beginner to confident investor. Our expert-led curriculum covers everything you need to succeed.

instructor1.name: Dr. Michael Torres
instructor1.title: Lead Instructor
instructor1.bio: 20+ years of experience in institutional asset management. Former portfolio manager at Fidelity Investments.

instructor2.name: Sarah Mitchell
instructor2.title: Technical Analysis Expert
instructor2.bio: Author of "Chart Patterns That Work" and regular contributor to technical analysis publications.

instructor3.name: James Chen
instructor3.title: Portfolio Strategy Instructor
instructor3.bio: Former quantitative strategist at Goldman Sachs. Specializes in factor investing and portfolio optimization.

testimonial1.name: Jennifer Adams
testimonial1.quote: This course transformed my understanding of the markets. The practical exercises and real-world case studies made complex concepts accessible.

testimonial2.name: Robert Kim
testimonial2.quote: Finally, an investment course that goes beyond basics without being overwhelming. The instructor support is exceptional.

testimonial3.name: Maria Garcia
